participant_abstract.sent: In our third meeting, as before, we went around the table and gave our individual power point presentations.
I had even less information to report on this time, but some of my contributions had a significant impact on our final design decision.
Manuel seemed to contribute the most, as his reports on the interior and exterior of the design (materials, energy source options, etc) were very crucial to our ultimate conclusions.

We ended by summarizing what we have all agreed on (I hope we are all clear on all of the specific criteria), and it is now almost time for the designers to construct our banana-shaped remote out of clay.

participant_actions.sent: The 2 designers will now build our model out of clay.

participant_decisions.sent: Energy will be batteries *-shape will be banana-like , with a yellow color *-the material will be plastic with minimal rubber finger grips.
Our remote will have in Ipod-like screen and scroll.

participant_problems.sent: Not sure that there were any!
(maybe just confirming that we are all clear on final decision after going back and forth several times).
